fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Check a player each night. If they're a Neutral Apocalypse, you will recruit them and allow them to win with you and any other Horsemen.
- Empower a recruited Apocalypse for the night. This does uhhh something host can figure it out
- Attack a player. You can only use this if all other Apocalypses are dead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You and recruited Apocalypses get a factional chat and win with each other as long as you're alive.
- Other Apocalypses' abilities will have no effect on you.
- You are cannot be deceived by frames or disguises.
- You cannot empower until you've recruited every living Apocalypse. You will be notified when it's available.
- At least one Neutral Apocalypse will probably spawn, probably?

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone other than the Apocalypses probably
